name: Waiting list
subject: Save your Seat - Design Tokens Camp #3 is open for registration
body:
Hi {name}, this is Osama El Drieny üëã
I‚Äôm contacting you because you previously applied to the Design Tokens Camp.
The new round is now open and will start on April 1st üéâ

üìå Camp details:
‚Ä¢ Duration: 6 weeks
‚Ä¢ Sessions: 2 per week
‚Ä¢ Session length: 3‚Äì4 hours
‚Ä¢ Schedule: Saturday and Tuesday evenings (around 7‚Äì8 PM)

üí∞ Cost: $500
Installment payments are available, as long as the full amount is completed before the course starts.

üéÅ Referral offer: Invite a friend and you‚Äôll both receive $50 off.

Save your seat now.

Would you like me to send you the payment link to join this round, or would you prefer to wait for the next one?

You can reply to this message or contact me on WhatsApp:
https://wa.me/60192231094

üìñ Course content details:
https://www.osamaeldrieny.com/courses/design-tokens-from-basic-to-mastery-course

name: Roles & Agreement
subject: Design Tokens Bootcamp Roles & Agreement ‚Äì Action Required
body:
Dear {name},

Before we start the Bootcamp, please review the program guidelines and agreement using the link below.

These guidelines help ensure a smooth and valuable experience for everyone. At the end of the form, select ‚ÄúAgree‚Äù to confirm your acceptance.

https://forms.gle/UpQ4D53TKJeLFieP8

Completion is required before the Bootcamp begins.

Best regards,
Osama

name: Cohort Grouping Form
subject: Cohort Grouping Form ‚Äì Required
body:
Dear {name},

To help us group cohorts effectively, please complete the form below.

Your answers will be used to balance experience levels, skills, and leadership preferences across groups, ensuring a better learning experience for everyone.

Please submit the form as soon as possible:

https://forms.gle/4GPqkDvo6tEw8YCZA

Thank you.

Best regards,
Osama

name: Community Invitation
subject: Welcome to Design Tokens Bootcamp
body:
üéâ Congratulations! {name},
You‚Äôre just one step away from joining the Design Tokens Community. Click the links below to get started:

üîó Main Community
Join all students from past & current camps.
https://chat.whatsapp.com/DgEOepsbvR60G19QlQh9NW

üí¨ General Group Chat
A space for everyone to share & discuss design, UI/UX, and more.
https://chat.whatsapp.com/EFhfq1GlGmwLhijfwKEvVv

üë• Design Tokens Camp Cohort 3
Your private group for this camp‚Äîsay hi and introduce yourself!
https://chat.whatsapp.com/JUjg4hCxGlE6jv1flQGOrW

name: Camp Feedback
subject: Your Honest Feedback = Your Bootcamp Certificate
body:
Dear {name} üéâ,

Congratulations on successfully completing the Bootcamp üëè

To receive your certificate, submitting your honest feedback is a required step.

We kindly ask that you take a few minutes to provide honest feedback, which will be shared publicly to help future cohorts.

Your input helps us improve the program and make it even better for everyone üöÄ

Please submit your feedback here:
https://forms.gle/Kff3Snxuv5tHrwUp7

Thank you for your effort and commitment throughout the Bootcamp üôå

Wishing you continued success ahead üåü

name: Payment $500
subject: Payment link $500
body:
Dear {name},

Congratulations üéâ

You are receiving this email because your application to join the Design Tokens Bootcamp has been approved and your full payment of $500 has been successfully confirmed.

Your seat in the bootcamp is now secured once you pay.

If you need to complete the payment, you can use the link below:

Recommended
https://buy.stripe.com/14A14mfS800w0NDcIJe3e0f

or pay using InstaPay:
https://ipn.eg/S/osamaeldrieny/instapay/7EGxaC
 
Click the link to send money to "osamaeldrieny@instapay" 

If you have any questions or need assistance, please feel free to contact me directly on WhatsApp:
https://wa.me/60192231094

More details about the bootcamp schedule, materials, and next steps will be shared with you soon.

Looking forward to having you in the bootcamp.

Best regards,
Osama Eldrieny

name: Google Drive link
subject: Design Tokens Bootcamp ‚Äì Shared Google Drive Folder
body:
Dear {name},

This email is to share the Google Drive folder that will be used throughout the Design Tokens Bootcamp for activities, tasks, and file sharing, so please make sure you can access it.

Inside the main folder, you will find a subfolder labeled with your name.

Google Drive folder link:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1pVmgOvy2MUXnGQhMkAxWJQCl5xmrabJy?usp=sharing

If you have any issues accessing your folder or have questions, please contact me directly on WhatsApp:
https://wa.me/60192231094

More instructions will be shared during the bootcamp sessions.

Best regards,
Osama Eldrieny

name: Shared Figma file
subject: Design Tokens Bootcamp ‚Äì Shared Figma File
body:
Dear {name},

This email is to share the main Figma file that will be used during the Design Tokens Bootcamp.

This is a shared Figma file for all students, and it will be used by me during the live sessions for explanations.

You will have edit access to follow along during the sessions.

A separate Figma file for each student will be shared later for individual work and tasks.

Shared Figma file link:
https://www.figma.com/design/ygDZoJa2OnLABhrJ16LpAA/Design-Tokens-Bootcamp‚ÄîOsama‚ÄìCopy-?node-id=0-1&t=dbqLszh6yjanMSy3-1

If you have any issues accessing the file, please contact me directly on WhatsApp:
https://wa.me/60192231094

Best regards,
Osama Eldrieny

name: Upcoming Rounds
subject: Design Tokens Bootcamp ‚Äì Upcoming Rounds
body:
Dear {name},

Thank you for your reply and for letting us know.

Noted that you will not be joining the April 2026 round. You are welcome to join the next round in September 2026, and we will get in touch with you closer to that round with all the relevant details.

If you‚Äôd like to reach out or have any questions, please reply to this email or contact us on WhatsApp:
https://wa.me/60192231094

Best regards,
Osama Eldrieny
